info.title: Idun Agent Manager API
info.description: Idun service for managing AI agents

post.description: Create a new managed agent with an EngineConfig. The agent is created in DRAFT status.

get.description: List all managed agents with pagination.

schema.title: Response List Agents Api V1 Agents  Get

get.description: Generate a unique API key (hash) for an agent to authenticate API requests.

get.summary: Get agent config by API key
get.description: Retrieve agent configuration using API key authentication (Bearer token).
Retrieve a specific managed agent by its UUID with complete configuration details.

delete.description: Permanently delete a managed agent and all its configuration data.

patch.description: Partially update an agent's configuration. Only the name andengine_config field can be updated if provided.

schema.title: Response Health Check Api V1 Healthz Get
Response Readiness Check Api V1 Readyz Get

get.description: Get application version and name from FastAPI app metadata.

schema.title: Response Version Api V1 Version Get

post.description: Create a new managed MCP server configuration.

get.description: List managed MCP server configurations with pagination.

schema.title: Response List Mcp Servers Api V1 Mcp Servers  Get

get.summary: Get managed MCP server by ID
get.description: Get a managed MCP server configuration by ID.

delete.description: Delete a managed MCP server configuration permanently.

post.description: Create a new managed observability configuration.

get.description: List managed observability configurations with pagination.

schema.title: Response List Observabilities Api V1 Observability  Get

get.summary: Get managed observability config by ID
get.description: Get a managed observability configuration by ID.

delete.description: Delete a managed observability configuration permanently.

post.description: Create a new managed memory configuration.

get.description: List managed memory configurations with pagination.

schema.title: Response List Memories Api V1 Memory  Get

get.summary: Get managed memory config by ID
get.description: Get a managed memory configuration by ID.

delete.description: Delete a managed memory configuration permanently.

get.description: Retrieve the list of supported agent frameworks in the platform.

schema.title: Response List Agent Frameworks Api V1 Agent Frameworks  Get

post.description: Create a new managed guardrail configuration.

get.description: List managed guardrail configurations with pagination.

schema.title: Response List Guardrails Api V1 Guardrails  Get

get.summary: Get managed guardrail config by ID
get.description: Get a managed guardrail configuration by ID.

delete.description: Delete a managed guardrail configuration permanently.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The project identifier where logs and traces will be sent.

region.title: Region
region.description: (Optional) The specific region/zone associated with the resource (e.g., us-central1).

log_name.title: Log Name
log_name.description: The identifier for the log stream (e.g., application-log).

resource_type.title: Resource Type
resource_type.description: The resource type label (e.g., global, gce_instance, cloud_run_revision).

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: Minimum level to record (e.g., INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL).

transport.title: Transport
transport.description: Selection for delivery method (e.g., BackgroundThread vs Synchronous).

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The project identifier where logs and traces will be sent.

region.title: Region
region.description: (Optional) The specific region/zone associated with the resource (e.g., us-central1).

trace_name.title: Trace Name
trace_name.description: The name for the trace or tracing session.

sampling_rate.title: Sampling Rate
sampling_rate.description: A number between 0.0 and 1.0 indicating the probability of a request being traced (e.g., 1.0 for 100%, 0.1 for 10%).

flush_interval.title: Flush Interval
flush_interval.description: Time in seconds to wait before sending buffered traces to the cloud.

ignore_urls.title: Ignore Urls
ignore_urls.description: A list or comma-separated string of URL paths to exclude from tracing (e.g., /health, /metrics).

config.title: Config
config.description: Configuration for the specific guardrail type

input.title: Input
input.description: List of guardrails to apply to input messages

output.title: Output
output.description: List of guardrails to apply to output messages

Guardrails-Input.title: Guardrails
Guardrails-Input.description: Class for specifying the engine's Guardrails configuration.

input.title: Input
input.description: List of guardrails to apply to input messages

output.title: Output
output.description: List of guardrails to apply to output messages

Guardrails-Output.title: Guardrails
Guardrails-Output.description: Class for specifying the engine's Guardrails configuration.

api_key.title: Api Key
api_key.description: The unique authentication key from the LangSmith settings page.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The project identifier (corresponds to project id in LangSmith).

project_name.title: Project Name
project_name.description: The name of the project in LangSmith to bucket these traces under (e.g., prod-chatbot-v1).

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: The URL endpoint, used primarily if you are self-hosting LangSmith or using a specific enterprise instance. (e.g., https://api.smith.langchain.com)

trace_name.title: Trace Name
trace_name.description: The name for the trace or tracing session.

tracing_enabled.title: Tracing Enabled
tracing_enabled.description: A toggle to globally turn tracing on or off.

capture_inputs_outputs.title: Capture Inputs Outputs
capture_inputs_outputs.description: A toggle to decide if the full text of LLM inputs and outputs should be logged.

name.title: Name
name.description: Unique identifier for this MCP server.

transport.title: Transport
transport.description: Transport type used to reach the MCP server.

url.title: Url
url.description: Endpoint URL for HTTP/S based transports (SSE, streamable_http, websocket).

command.title: Command
command.description: Executable to run when using stdio transport.

args.title: Args
args.description: Arguments to pass to the command for stdio transport.

env.title: Env
env.description: Environment variables to set when spawning stdio servers.

encoding_error_handler.title: Encoding Error Handler
encoding_error_handler.description: Encoding error handler for stdio transport.

timeout_seconds.title: Timeout Seconds
timeout_seconds.description: Timeout in seconds for HTTP/S transports (maps to `timeout`).

sse_read_timeout_seconds.title: Sse Read Timeout Seconds
sse_read_timeout_seconds.description: Timeout in seconds waiting for SSE events (maps to `sse_read_timeout`).

terminate_on_close.title: Terminate On Close
terminate_on_close.description: Whether to terminate Streamable HTTP sessions on close.

session_kwargs.title: Session Kwargs
session_kwargs.description: Extra keyword arguments forwarded to MCP ClientSession.
